Posts.Content: Candice1 wrote: My best friend just couldn't go through with the mri today and her doctor said there is no open mri option.  I am trying to help her as much as possible and would appreciate it if anyone knows of an alterative for her.  She also can't handle being sedated.  She is already so frightened I want to help as much as I can.  If anyone knows of a location please let me know.  We live in Atlanta but willing to travel.  Thank you so much.
